channel.title: How do i keep the userdatabase safe?
channel.description: well my idea was that we would have a login server that connects to a sqldatabase to verifiy login information. however that still leaves the database wide open because anyone with alittle modification can sit their and dump the entire database by making loginverification checks. so my question is how do we prevent this?

item.title: How do i keep the userdatabase safe?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

If you’re worried about passwords and know that you won’t need to know them then you can use a MessageDigest and encrypt passwords before placing them in the database. Then when people login you can use a MessageDigest again before comparing it to the password stored in the database.
